document.full_text: a fuming phil mickelson questioned the design of the tpc sawgrass after his ball found water at the players championship on thursday despite landing the tee shot comfortably on the green.
document.title: mickelson blasts sawgrass layout after ball finds water
lines_and_colors: a fuming phil mickelson questioned the design of the tpc sawgrass after his ball found water at the players championship on thursday despite landing the tee shot comfortably on the green.
